# Status, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** Apostle of peace 4, [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[Community (Domain)|Community 4]], Healer 6

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Targets:** One creature touched/3 levels

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC)Â­, pg. 100

As *[[Status (Spell)|status]]*, but you can also cast a limited selection of spells through the link, as if you were touching the target. You can cast any spell that meets the following conditions:

- Level: 0, 1st, or 2nd
- Range: Touch
- Target: Creature touched
- Saving Throw: Harmless

For example, if you become aware (through the *greater status* spell) that one of your linked companions is [[Dying|dying]], you can cast *[[Cure Moderate Wounds (Spell)|cure moderate wounds]]* to try to revive her.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Healer 6 per Heroes of Battle.
